name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-angular-multipage
title: Angular multi-page client-side web part
shortDescription: This is a sample SharePoint Framework client-side web part built using Angular, illustrating building multi-page web parts.
longDescription: This is a sample SharePoint Framework client-side web part built using Angular, illustrating building multi-page web parts.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
